Abys z칤skal n치hodn칠 캜칤slo v n캩jak칠m rozsahu, mus칤코 nejd콏칤ve z칤skat n치hodn칠 캜칤slo v rozd칤lu minima (55) a maxima (90), tedy v 36 (+ 1 tam je kv콢li odbour치n칤 0 jako mo쬹osti). A abys mohl p콏ev칠st v칳sledn칠 캜칤slo do sv칠ho rozsahu (55 a 90), mus칤코 p콏i캜칤st minimum, 캜칤m jednodu코e p콏esune코 v칳sledek do rozsahu.

P콏edstav si n치sleduj칤c칤 kroky: 

1)`Math.floor(Math.random() (ourMax - ourMin + 1)) + ourMin`
2)`Math.floor(Math.random() (90 - 55 + 1)) + 50`
3) `Math.floor(Math.random() (36)) + 55`
Takto ur캜uje코 rozsah, tedy nap콏. n치hodn칠 캜칤slo od 55 do 90.

Ahoj lidi, pr치v캩 se sna쮂셠 pochopit tento k칩d    Math.floor(Math.random() * (ourMax - ourMin + 1)) + ourMin .   
Math.floor a Math.random ch치pu probl칠m mi d캩l치 tento kus k칩du (ourMax - ourMin + 1)) + ourMin    kdy jsem toti d캩lal poprv칠 Math.random  bylo m칤sto tohoto vzorce    * 20 a to mi smysl d치valo ale toto mi trochu d캩l치 probl칠m, nebyl by tu pros칤m n캩kdo kdo by mi tento vzorec podrobn캩 vysv캩tlil ? ##Please note that we now recommend campers use their Campsite뗩 Facebook group for chatting instead of their campsite뗩 Gitter chatroom. 
We are doing this because few of our Campsite Gitter chatroooms have active synchronous discussions, and about 1/3rd of conversations consist of someone saying 랃ello and not getting a response. Most of the discussions are asynchronous, which Facebook posts and group messages are better suited for.
We뗬e removed this Gitter room from our Campsite directory. Still, we will keep it open for archival purposes, and you can keep using it if you뗛 like.
Here뗩 a short blog post about how our Campsites are evolving and growing: http://blog.freecodecamp.com/2015/09/jump-start-your-local-campsite-with-coffee-and-code.html
